name: .JOS
summary: Learn about .JOS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If your JOS file is stored alongside associated Java OpenStreetMap (JOSM) session data (saved in a directory named layers), opening the JOS file with JOSM will open the corresponding JOSM session. If your JOS file is not stored alongside its associated JOSM session data, opening the file with JOSM won't do anything (besides producing an error message).
If you want to view the XML data your JOS file contains, you can open it with Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or any other text editor.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .jos file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: JOS file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
